bug.author: enghwa
bug.summary: UriUtil.ts using window.location.port will cause error if port is 80
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
const port = IS_DEV_ENV ? WEBSOCKET_PORT_DEV : Number(window.location.port) <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
ser server port at 80. <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
ws: url at port 80 <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
ws url at port 0. This is due to browsers removing port 80 in window.location

comments.comment: Thanks for finding this <denchmark-link:https://github.com/enghwa>@enghwa</denchmark-link> ! We're merging the fix today and doing a point release ASAP.
